channel.title: Balance Open Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.9.2
item.description:
New Features

  • Added prompt to move to Applications directory so updates work properly
  • First Sparkle update release, all future releases should auto-update

item.title: Version 0.9.3
item.description:
Bug Fixes

  • Fixed non english locales
  • Fixed auto launch
  • Fixed Coinbase syncing problems

item.title: Version 0.9.4
item.description:
More Exchanges!

We've been working really hard getting the 1.0 release ready. Since the last beta release, we've added support for viewing your holdings at the GDAX, Poloniex, Bitfinex, and Kraken exchanges. Also, we've added the ability to monitor any Ethereum address, just enter the public address and you can watch all Ether and token balances for that address.
